titleStmt.title: James E. Green et al. to Abraham Lincoln
DPM0824

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Copy
On Board Str De Molay
Near Matagorda Bay Texas Jan. 1st 1864
To his Excellency Abraham Lincoln
President of the United States of America

The undersigned Officers of the 4th Div. 13th A. C. humbly submit to your Excellency the appointment of Col. W. J. Landram 19th Ky Vol. Inf. to be Brigadier General for his faithful services as Brigade and Division Commander since Oct. 20th 1862

Jos E. Green Maj. 23d Wisc Vols
J. E. Duncan Camp. 23d Wis. Vols
J. M. Sumner Capt " " "
J. N. Angle Surg.n " " "
Basil Smart Lt. " " "
Henry Vilas Capt. " " "
John A. Burdett Capt. 77" Ill. Vols
D. Lepham 1st Lt. 96" O.V.I.
Wm Achenbach Capt 97th Ill Vols
Carl Jussen Adj 23d. Wisc Vols
F. M. Lull Lt. & A. R. Q. M. 23d Wisc Vols
J. M. Sheilds Lt. & A. Ord. off. 4 D. 13 A. C.
R. B. Crandall Lt. 23d Wisc Vols
B. C. Long Capt. 67 Ind. Inf. Vols
E. McVay Lt. 60 Ind. Vols
J. M. Cowen A. Surg. 77 Reg Ill Vols
John Landram 1st Lt. 19th Ky
